product_name: Benefit CosmeticsThe POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingBenefit's lightweight, silky-smooth The POREfessional Get Unblocked Makeup-Removing Cleansing Oil does it all: visibly loosens and melts away makeup, unblocks and unclogs pores AND leaves skin feeling nourished and conditioned.
details: DetailsBenefitsVisibly melts away dirt, oil & makeupVisibly unclogs, unblocks & clears out poresSilky-smooth formula feels lightweight & nourishingClinically provenDermatologist-testedGentleNon-comedogenicSuitable for all skin typesRespects the skin's pHOphthalmologist-testedPart of Benefit's Pore Care collection - a collection specially developed to help minimize, clear & smooth the look of poresKey IngredientsGrape seed, jojoba seed, avocado & plum kernel oils, rich in essential fatty acids like Omega-9, help nourish & conditionCeramide NP helps maintain moisture balanceBisabolol helps skin feel comfortableResearch ResultsAFTER 1 USE: 93% said it visibly melts away dirt, oil & makeup*AFTER 1 USE: 93% said it visibly dissolves pore-clogging oil & grime*AFTER 1 USE: 94% said skin feels nourished*AFTER 1 MONTH: 93% said pores look clear**AFTER 1 MONTH: 92% said skin looks less congested**AFTER 1 MONTH: 96% said skin looks healthy***Self-evaluation by 107 participants after 1 use**Self-evaluation by 107 participants after 1 monthItem 2606911How To UseTIPS & TRICKS: Buh-bye makeup, hello clear pores!Apply with dry hands. Massage thoroughly on to dry face & eye area in circular motions. Wet hands & keep massaging to emulsify. Rinse. Use daily PM.Beauty Tip: Pair with The POREfessional Good Cleanup foaming cleanser for a thorough double cleanse and to remove waterproof and longwearing makeup.IngredientsCaprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, PEG-40 Sorbitan Peroleate, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Parfum (Fragrance), Bisabolol, Prunus Domestica Seed Oil, Triethyl Citrate, Tocopherol, Ceramide Np, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.No 7004.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: TIPS & TRICKS: Buh-bye makeup, hello clear pores!Apply with dry hands. Massage thoroughly on to dry face & eye area in circular motions. Wet hands & keep massaging to emulsify. Rinse. Use daily PM.Beauty Tip: Pair with The POREfessional Good Cleanup foaming cleanser for a thorough double cleanse and to remove waterproof and longwearing makeup.
ingredients: Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate.No 7004.Disclaimer: Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit product

reviews.headline: Good but could be better
reviews.comments: I received this product as a free gift when buying foundation from the same brand.  I needed to use additional cleansers to remove the foundation, but this did a nice job with my eye makeup and waterproof mascara.  It doesn't irritate my skin and hasn't caused any breakouts.  Overall, I'd say I like it, but I don't love it. I normally use a cleansing balm to remove makeup, and I feel like the balm works a lot better for me than this does.

reviews.headline: Made my breakouts worse & more frequent
reviews.comments:
I went to Ulta in person with the intention of trying a certain product, the employee said that this item worked extremely well with the one I went in to buy. I realized that when I started to use this one, my acne was just out of control. I have sensitive skjn and have suffered from acne since I was a kid. As I've aged, my skin is less break out prone although still scarred. I thought I was at a point where maybe I can work on my pores and scars since I was not getting as many breakouts. However, this product gave me severe acne on my cheeks, every morning it seemed that I had more white heads popping out. I was using acne patches like crazy. I stopped using it and it has settled down significantly. 
I was very disappointed in this product. I tried to have the perspective of it gets worse before it gets better since my skin is sensitive, but it just was not worth what I was going through. 
I will say that that the product does feel oily but my skin felt light after washing it off.

reviews.headline: Decent but could be better
reviews.comments: It's just okay, I bought this to use when I travel to remove my make up. At first impression its a nice cleanser, but I've noticed multiple times the next morning that it didn't fully remove all of my mascara from the previous day. I don't even use waterproof mascara. After massaging this into my lashes and all over my face, I use a makeup eraser cloth in warm water to remove the cleanser, then move onto a water-based cleanser and so on. I'm still using this when traveling but once it's gone, I'll try something else.

reviews.headline: Works on waterproof makeup
reviews.comments: Love this stuff. I used to use MAC's cleansor oil, but they discontinued it. This oil is actually better than MAC's. So glad i found it

reviews.headline: Game Changer
reviews.comments:
To say the least 
blackheads are a thing of the past for me due to this product workings 
as I age, I started getting these like hard wartts on my face., but since Courtney showed me this I don't have them anymore.
Thank God for Courtney for introducing me to this product and how to use it helped this aging beauty with whatever warts was on my face.
Ty

reviews.headline: Removes even the most stubborn makeup
reviews.comments: This makeup remover is fantastic. Just a little bit removes most of my makeup daily. I use it with the Good Cleanup cleanser and my skin looks and feels so soft and clean. I loved this mini so much that i immediately bought a full size.

reviews.headline: did the job but...
reviews.comments: I got this in a sample size as a free gift with purchase. It works well getting my waterproof Mascara off. I washed my face with my usual products but the next morning, my face was red, itchy, and a little swollen. I'm not sure if the remover and my face products didn't react well together but I do have sensitive skin. I wouldn't recommend.

reviews.headline: One of my necessary products
reviews.comments: Absolutely a miracle product. Clears blackheads and removes makeup without irritating my sensitive and dramatic skin

reviews.headline: WOAAAAH
reviews.comments:
I just used this for the first time in a double cleanse routine im trying. I have the nastiest little black dots on my nose (sebaceous fillaments) & after massaging this on my nose & face for about 10 mins, literally half of them are gone!!! 
pro tip: put a hot/warm washcloth over your face for a few minutes before to open your pores! :)

reviews.headline: Would not recommend
reviews.comments: Does a wonderful job removing makeup. However, it left me with a painful rash and burning eyelids. I've never experienced anything like it.

reviews.headline: Truly amazing
reviews.comments: I love this makep remover. I've tried many different oils balms and wipes but has worked best. Probably wont buy anything else.

reviews.headline: Did the job, but my face hated it
reviews.comments: I loved the consistency and ease it had with taking off my makeup. However, im not someone who has "sensitive skin", but this product made my face itchy, red and blotchy. I have to take a Benadryl in order to get some relief. I do have their hydration, toner, and clay mask thay comes with this line and those are all fantastic.

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me.
reviews.comments: No matter how much I rubbed my eyes, it didnt remove my mascara like I had hoped. Also, it made my eyes burn. The smell is rather strong, it's not a bad smell just fragrant. Would not purchase again.

reviews.headline: 100% AMAZING
reviews.comments: This product is the best thing ever! It cleared out the pores on my cheeks and nose and OMG my face looks better than ever

reviews.headline: Not that great
reviews.comments: For the price, I wanted to love it but unfortunately, I don't. I felt like I had to use too much product to fully remove eye makeup and in my opinion the product is a bit watery. It's an okay cleanser but I'll have to try something  different

reviews.headline: Shockingly good precleanser
reviews.comments: I bought the travel bottle first make sure it worked and its amazing-easy fast and always rinses clean

reviews.headline: Recommended product.....
reviews.comments: Thorough cleanse and ultralite feel

reviews.headline: I really love it
reviews.comments: I can't tell you if it minimizes pores because I use it only on days I wear makeup. I can say that I love how it leaves my skin. I do have less blackheads and it really takes off all makeup. My skin looks great after using it and I'm planning on incorporating it perm in my routine.

reviews.headline: Ok
reviews.comments:
I only use it to take off my waterproof eye make up, I havent paid attention to the skincare side, although I have been getting more pimples, I never get pimples. 
It takes off my waterproof brows and mascara very well without any irritation or watery eyes, I get watery clody eyes from every other product.

reviews.headline: Noticeable difference in pore appearance
reviews.comments: This is a really good first cleanse, it melts makeup easily and my pores look a lot clearer after using this vs just using my regular face wash

media.headline: Felt good
media.caption: My skin after using 3 other products from Porefessional range (also gifted)

faceoff_positive.comments:
As someone who wears a full face of makeup daily, I was on the hunt for a cleansing oil that could thoroughly remove all types of makeup. Fortunately, I found one that exceeded my expectations. This oil does an excellent job of breaking down product and removing all traces of makeup. It's become an essential part of my double-cleansing routine.

What I appreciate most about this cleansing oil is how smoothly it glides onto the skin. Unlike other cleansing oils that can feel heavy and greasy, this one feels light and luxurious. The clean, refreshing scent is also a nice touch.

Admittedly, this cleansing oil is a bit more sticky than others I've tried. However, it doesn't bother me since I always follow up with a gentle gel cleanser. In fact, I think the stickiness helps to break down the makeup and impurities even more effectively.

Overall, I highly recommend this cleansing oil to anyone in need of a deep, thorough cleanse. Its ability to remove all types of makeup is impressive, and the smooth application and refreshing scent make it a joy to use. While I received this product complimentary from Benefit Cosmetics, I will definitely be purchasing it in the future.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great Oil Cleanser!
